t:
This Christmas, I just want tons of Uranium-233, a nuclear power plant and a complete collapse of all the power grids in the world.



But I guess I'll just settle for a nice dinner and ‘A Christmas Story’.

                  As long as it's with you.
c:
This Christmas, a cute love story with a twisted start. No horror, that's a twist.



#love #christmas #uranium #power #collapse #monopoly #dinner #twist
